name: Prohibition
text:
PART III.  ASBESTOS EMISSION AND LEAD HAZARD CONTROL

Note
  Part heading amended by L 1998, c 242, pt of §3.
     No person, including any public body, shall engage in any activity that causes a violation of this chapter. [L 1991, c 219, pt of §1; am L 1998, c 242, pt of §3]
